issue.title: Updating third-party libraries
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Update of the embedded libraries, specifically the sensitive libraries (security).
In particular Spring (https://spring.io/blog/2018/04/05/multiple-cve-reports-published-for-the-spring-framework + https://spring.io/blog/2018/04/09/cve-2018-1275-address-partial-fix-for-cve-2018-1270)

Source (french) : https://projets.asitvd.ch/issues/19794

**Fixed versions :** 4.5.1
